mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM (SELECT lectureNum, teacher, title, describe, imagePath, videoPath, viewCount, regdate, Large_category,small_category FROM LECTURE WHERE Large_category=2 ORDER BY lectureNum DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE (lectureNum, teacher, title, describe, imagePath, videoPath, viewCount, regdate, Large_category,small_category) VALUES(LECTURE_seq.NEXTVAL, #{teacher}, #{title}, #{describe},#{imagePath}, #{videoPath}, #{viewCount}, SYSDATE, #{Large_category}, #{small_category} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT lectureNum, teacher, title, describe, imagePath, videoPath, viewCount, regdate, Large_category,small_category, LAG(lectureNum, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY lectureNum DESC) AS prevNum, LEAD(lectureNum, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY lectureNum DESC) AS nextNum FROM LECTURE ORDER BY lectureNum DESC) WHERE lectureNum = #{lectureNum}
